Blog 10

Published on Apr 17, 2020

    Create and Attach Volume to an AWS EC2

    Create Volume:

    Open EC2 Management Console and click on Volumes: Click on Create Volume: Create Volume: Click Create Volume:

    Attach Volume to an AWS EC2

    Go back to EC2 Management Console and click on Volumes: Than choose your created volume and click on Actions > Attach Volume Click on Instance and choose your EC2 instance:

    note: make sure you create EC2 and Volume in the same availability zone exp: us-east-2c
